DOC.brief_summary: This trial compare long term safety effectiveness V Flex Plus PTX Drug Eluting coronary stent conventional treatment in-stent restenosis coronary artery .
DOC.criteria: Patient give informed consent Patient target lesion native coronary artery coronary bypass graft Patient instent restenosis > 60 % Patient reference artery diameter 2.73.5 Patient agree return clinical assessment 1 , 6 , 9 , 12 24 month treadmill test 9 month angiogram 9 month 24 month . Patient le 18 year age Patient pregnant breast feed Patient history bleed diathesis coagulopathy refuse blood transfusion . Patient simultaneously participate another investigative interventional cardiovascular drug device study . Patient known hypersensitivity contraindication aspirin stainless steel sensitivity contrast agent .
